pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Level Interface for Survival Analysis and Associated Plots // A high-level interface to perform survival analysis, including Kaplan-Meier analysis and log-rank tests and Cox regression. Aims at providing a clear and elegant syntax, support for use in a pipeline, structured output and plotting. Builds upon the 'survminer' package for Kaplan-Meier plots and provides a customizable implementation for forest plots. Kaplan Meier (1958) doi:10.1080/01621459.1958.10501452 Cox (1972) JSTOR:2985181 Peto Peto (1972) JSTOR:2344317.
